2163.subject: CART
2163.descrlong:
An in-depth study of stop-motion animation production through the experience of making a short film, this class will focus on giving students studio time to experiment with poses, timing and pacing throughout the film. Students will experiment with storytelling, puppet fabrication, set & prop design, animation, lighting and compositing.  (Credit/ No Credit Available)

(Prereq: CART 370)
